snippet: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has proposed modest economic changes and kept the bureaucracy largely in place, frustrating those who thought he would introduce bold policies.
abstract: Memo from New Delhi; India's Prime Min Narendra Modi has proposed modest economic changes and kept bureaucracy largely in palce, frustrating those who hoped he would bring about bold new policies.

byline.contributor: Neha Thirani Bagri contributed reporting from Mumbai, India.

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has proposed modest economic changes and kept the bureaucracy largely in place, frustrating those who thought he would introduce bold policies.

headline.main: Narendra Modi’s Quiet Beginning Dims India’s Hopes for Swift Change
headline.print_headline: Hopes Fade as India Leader Starts Quietly
